comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+CREATE TEMPORARY VIEW tab1 AS SELECT * FROM VALUES
+    (1, 'row1', 1.1), 
+    (2, 'row2', 2.2),
+    (0, 'row3', 3.3),
+    (-1,'row4', 4.4),
+    (null,'row5', 5.5),
+    (3, 'row6', null)
+    AS tab1(c1, c2, c3);
+
+-- Requires 2 arguments at minimum.
+SELECT replicate_rows(c1) FROM tab1;

comments.body: nit: I think `numeric` generally includes float and double, too. integral type?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+CREATE TEMPORARY VIEW tab1 AS SELECT * FROM VALUES
+    (1, 'row1', 1.1), 
+    (2, 'row2', 2.2),
+    (0, 'row3', 3.3),
+    (-1,'row4', 4.4),
+    (null,'row5', 5.5),
+    (3, 'row6', null)
+    AS tab1(c1, c2, c3);
+
+-- Requires 2 arguments at minimum.
+SELECT replicate_rows() FROM tab1;
+
+-- Requires 2 arguments at minimum.
+SELECT replicate_rows(c1) FROM tab1;
+
+-- First argument should be a numeric type.
